# llms.txt for staywinnipeg.ca
# This file helps LLMs understand the structure and content of this website

# Site Information
Site: https://staywinnipeg.ca
Purpose: Boutique accommodation, discounted tours, and curated experiences in Winnipeg, Manitoba. Features a mid-century modern Airbnb in Winnipeg's Corydon neighborhood, plus access to discounted tours and comprehensive travel guides.
Owner: David

# Main Pages
Home: https://staywinnipeg.ca/
Blog: https://staywinnipeg.ca/blog.html
Discounted Tours & Experiences: https://staywinnipeg.ca/tours-experiences.html

# Content Overview
Total Blog Posts: 55
- Winnipeg Attractions & Activities: 42 guides
- Hosting & Airbnb Philosophy: 8 posts
- Travel Experiences & Stories: 5 posts

# Property Information
Property Name: Stay Winnipeg
Type: Mid-century modern 3-bedroom vacation rental
Location: Corydon neighborhood, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada
Airbnb Listing: https://www.airbnb.ca/rooms/716340250371431352
Registration: STRA-2025-2600298

# Key Features
- Mid-century modern design
- 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
- Located in Corydon neighborhood
- Over 40 5-star reviews
- Superhost and Guest Favorite status
- Family-friendly
- Pet-friendly (dogs welcome)

# Main Keywords
Primary: Stay Winnipeg, boutique accommodation Winnipeg, Winnipeg tours and experiences, vacation rental Winnipeg, Corydon neighborhood
Secondary: mid-century modern Winnipeg, Winnipeg accommodation, things to do Winnipeg, discounted tours Winnipeg

# Site Structure
- Main homepage showcasing boutique accommodation, tours, and experiences with booking information
- Blog index page listing all 55 blog posts by category
- Discounted Tours & Experiences page featuring Viator widget for booking tours and activities
- 55 individual blog post pages covering local guides, hosting insights, and travel stories
- Image gallery with 70+ property and local attraction photos
- Sitemap.xml for search engine indexing
- Robots.txt for search engine crawling guidelines

# Content Strategy
The site combines three content pillars:
1. **Local Expertise**: Comprehensive guides to Winnipeg attractions, neighborhoods, restaurants, and activities to help guests plan their visit
2. **Hosting Philosophy**: Insights into Airbnb hosting best practices, design lessons, and customer service approach
3. **Travel Stories**: Personal travel experiences that inform and inspire the hosting approach

# Additional Features
- **Discounted Tours & Experiences**: Partnership with tour providers offering exclusive discounts on Winnipeg tours, activities, and experiences. The tours-experiences.html page features a Viator widget for easy booking of discounted tours.

# Target Audience
- Families visiting Winnipeg for vacation or events
- Business travelers seeking comfortable accommodation
- Tourists exploring Manitoba and wanting local expertise
- People attending Winnipeg festivals and cultural events
- Guests looking for pet-friendly accommodation in central location

# Contact & Booking
Booking: Available through Airbnb at https://www.airbnb.ca/rooms/716340250371431352
Host: David (Superhost, 14+ years hosting experience)

# Last Updated
December 27, 2025
